description.value: Once per Game Session when in the presence of a suitable power source, such as a Portable Generator or Regimental Vehicle Power Plant, they can make a +0 Toughness Tet as a Full Action. If Successful they remove 1d5 Wounds, +1 per Degree of Success. They cannot remove Critical Damage this way. If they Fail the test, they take 1 Damage, +1 per 3 Degress of Failiure, ignoring Armour and Toughness Bonus.

system.benefit: Once per Game Session when in the presence of a suitable power source, such as a Portable Generator or Regimental Vehicle Power Plant, they can make a +0 Toughness Tet as a Full Action. If Successful they remove 1d5 Wounds, +1 per Degree of Success. They cannot remove Critical Damage this way. If they Fail the test, they take 1 Damage, +1 per 3 Degress of Failiure, ignoring Armour and Toughness Bonus.

prerequisites.text: T 45, Potentia Coil Induction, Implanted Potentia or Mechanicus Implants.
